title: Bug 102623: Image not refreshing after importing again
OB: After importing a new image ('image1.jpg') into the layout again, the image does not refresh or update. The original image remains displayed.
EB: When importing a new image ('image1.jpg') into the layout again, the image should refresh and display the new image instead of the original one.
SR:
1. Open the layout.
2. Import a new image ('image1.jpg') into the layout.
3. Repeat step 2 and import the same image ('image1.jpg') again.
4. Check if the image updates to the new imported image or if it still displays the original image.
